biz.pavonis.hexameter.api

Class CoordinateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.pavonis.hexameter.api.CoordinateConverter

  • public final class CoordinateConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for converting coordinated from the offset system to the axial one (the library uses the latter).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int convertOffsetCoordinatesToAxialX(int x, int y, HexagonOrientation orientation)
      Calculates the axial X coordinate based on an offset coordinate pair.
      static int convertOffsetCoordinatesToAxialZ(int x, int y, HexagonOrientation orientation)
      Calculates the axial Z coordinate based on an offset coordinate pair.
      static AxialCoordinate createCoordinateFromKey(java.lang.String key)
      Creates an AxialCoordinate based on a key.
      static java.lang.String createKeyFromCoordinate(int gridX, int gridZ)
      Creates a key based on a grid coordinate to be used in lookups.
      static java.lang.String createKeyFromHexagon(Hexagon hex)
      Creates a key that is the coordinate of the given hexagon in the grid to be printed.
